snippet: CHERNOFF--Arnold, 75, died on March 14, 2016. Beloved husband of Sandi; devoted father of Melanie (Donald) and Richard; dear brother of Debby; proud grampy of Ella and Evan. Arnold was president of New York Advisory Services, Inc. Services 1:15pm today at Sanctuary of Abraham and Sarah, 735 Forest Avenue, Paramus, NJ. 1/3
lead_paragraph: CHERNOFF--Arnold, 75, died on March 14, 2016. Beloved husband of Sandi; devoted father of Melanie (Donald) and Richard; dear brother of Debby; proud grampy of Ella and Evan. Arnold was president of New York Advisory Services, Inc. Services 1:15pm today at Sanctuary of Abraham and Sarah, 735 Forest Avenue, Paramus, NJ. 1/3
